main event: Witnesses observed a bright, multicolored light in the sky in Canton, Ohio, on September 10, 1966.
interesting points: The object changed colors from red to blue, green, and white during the observation., The light appeared very bright and did not resemble any known aircraft configuration., The object was visible for approximately 5 minutes., Witnesses reported that the light did not disappear but instead intermittently faded and brightened., The witness could not relate the object's appearance to any common object, indicating it was unfamiliar.
sighted object: a bright multicolored light in the sky
